Conjuration 5

Heavenly Fires

EA T'ien Ch'i

Ritual
F1S1
spell id [id]: 418
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 926
number of effects [nreff]: 3
gems required [gemcost]: 6F
Summon Units:#926 Demon of Heavenly Fires x 3
The Demon of Heavenly Fires is a violent Celestial being sprung from heavenly fires. It has the appearance of a furious man in golden robes. The demon throws flaming wheels and can fly. Demons of Heavenly Fires are sacred and are more powerful in hot, dry lands.
